answers.answer: Call your L&D or your OB office, you really need to get your BP checked, especially with a history of high BP, and your symptoms combined you could have preeclampsia. Either way I'd get it checked, good luck hun!!
i check my bp at home its 128/77 right now but still having headaches and not feeling right
well called doctor she wants me to  go to l&d to get monitored but i have to wait an hour before she gets off work cuz both my kids are running fever and coughing
Good luck!! I hope all is okay!
well went to L&D and they did blood work and everything came back good except my potassium was low
Well that's good, I'm glad everything turned out well!!

question: ok im little over 34 weeks and yesturday and horrible headache almost all day. Last night i couldnt sleep for nothing i even tried and hot shower fell asleep around 12 then woke up at 3 went back to sleep woke again at 6 went sleep again woke at 7. i still have a headache feeling sick to stomach starting to see floaters and feel off cant really explain it. I do have high blood pressure that im on medicine for since 13 weeks. Just dont know what to do at this point.
title: 34+2 feeling weird
